translation.en: ♪ We always shine so bright We'll help you make it right ♪
translation.es: Siempre brillamos. Juntos lo haremos bien.
LA TROPA ACCIÓN SALVA LA NAVIDAD
Listo. Adornado con poder de plasma.

translation.en: Nothing's better than a grizzly-bear-big stack of presents with your name on 'em.
translation.es: Nada como una montaña de regalos tan alta como un oso.

translation.en: I had so much fun making Hanukkah presents when we celebrated with you, Watts,
translation.es: Me divertí tanto haciendo regalos de Janucá contigo,

translation.en: that I made Christmas presents for everyone too.
translation.es: que hice regalos de Navidad para todos.

translation.en: Ooh, holidays make me hamster-hedgehog-hummingbird happy!
Nuh-uh, Watts. It's Hope Springs' Christmas tradition
translation.es: No, según la tradición, no podemos abrirlos

translation.en: that you don't open gifts until the gift exchange
translation.es: No, según la tradición, no podemos abrirlos hasta la ceremonia de iluminación del árbol.
hasta la ceremonia de iluminación del árbol.

translation.en: Right. Presents happen after I help light up the tree! [grunts]
translation.es: Nada de regalos hasta que ayude a iluminarlo.

translation.en: -[Mr. Ernesto] Watts! -The crowd cheers! They chant my name!
Light the tree, not the teacher.
translation.es: Ilumina al árbol, no a mí.

translation.en: [gasps] Wow, Action Pack! Mission Decorate The Action Academy is complete.
translation.es: La misión de decorar la academia acción está completa.

translation.en: You kids are clear to go to the tree lighting. Grab your gifts for the exchange,
translation.es: Ya pueden ir a la ceremonia. Lleven sus regalos.

translation.en: and I'll be there as soon as my cookies are done.
translation.es: Yo iré cuando mis galletas estén listas.

translation.en: [carol singers] ♪ Dashing through the snow In a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.es: Moviéndose por la nieve en un trineo de un caballo.

translation.en: ♪ O'er the fields we go Laughing all the way… ♪
translation.es: Sobre los campos vamos, riéndonos todo el tiempo…

translation.en: ♪ Making spirits bright What fun it is to… ♪
It's too early for Christmas music!
translation.es: Es muy pronto para los villancicos.

translation.en: Oh, Mr. Grumpman, it's Christmas Eve!
[singers] ♪ Oh, what fun it is to ride… ♪
As my first toy, you understand that being the child of the Von Taker toy tycoons
translation.es: Gracias a ser el hijo del magnate de los juguetes Von Robo tengo todos los juguetes de Hope Springs.

translation.en: means I get every toy made in Hope Springs.
translation.es: tengo todos los juguetes de Hope Springs.

translation.en: But I, Teddy Von Taker, need more toys! Toys not built in Hope Springs.
translation.es: Pero necesito más juguetes, los que no se crearon Hope Springs.

translation.en: And to take them, I need more power.
That's where my Christmas Cheer-Taker comes in.
Once I get the Christmas cheer, I'll be ready for Santa tonight.
translation.es: Cuando la consiga, estaré listo para Santa esta noche.

translation.en: There's a kid with Christmas cheer! Shall we, Matthew?
Time to take the cheer away.
translation.es: Es hora de robar su alegría.

translation.en: [Teddy laughs] It's working! More cheer for me, less cheer for everyone else!
translation.es: ¡Funciona! Más alegría para mí, menos para ellos.

translation.en: I'll be taking your cheer too. [sinister laugh]
♪ Oh, what fun it is to ride In a one-horse open sleigh, hey! ♪
translation.es: ¡Qué divertido es andar en trineo esta noche!

translation.en: [Phil] I don't really feel like singin'.
Finally! I can enjoy Christmas in peace.
translation.es: Al fin podré disfrutar la Navidad en paz.

translation.en: You think you're just gonna suck out all the cheer
to power up that battery thingamajig?
translation.es: para encender la batería de ese trasto?

translation.en: Well, I don't have any cheer to take! [laughs]
I say the joke is on you, sir.
translation.es: La broma es para usted, señor.

translation.en: You have a little cheer in there after all.
More cheer, more power for me! [laughs]
And then, one Christmas, I got an art kit, and it had paint and glitter and--
translation.es: Una Navidad, recibí un kit de arte. Tenía pintura, brillantina y…

translation.en: This Christmas party isn't looking like a party at all.
translation.es: Esta Navidad no parece una fiesta.

translation.en: -What's wrong, Cold Snap? -I don't feel like celebrating. Goodbye.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasa, Ola de Frío? - No tengo ganas de celebrar.

translation.en: What? I thought Cold Snap would love Christmas.
translation.es: Creía que Ola de Frío amaba la Navidad.

translation.en: Well, Hanukkah's all about being with your family, and kindness, and giving too.
translation.es: Janucá se trata de estar con tu familia y de ser amable.

translation.en: All of those things make me happy, so I don't think that's it.
translation.es: Esas cosas me hacen feliz. No debe ser eso.

translation.en: Something strange is going on here.
This place should be bubbling with Christmas cheer.
Why, hello, Action Pack. You have just the cheer I'm here to take, take, take.
translation.es: Hola, Tropa Acción. Tienen la alegría que vine a robar.

translation.en: Wonderful! The Toy Tycoon Multi-Purpose Gauntlet is quite handy.
translation.es: ¡Maravilloso! El guante multiuso es muy útil.

translation.en: Take our cheer? What does he mean?
I don't know. But we better find out.
Action Pack, circle up, hoodies up, and…
translation.es: Tropa Acción, reúnanse, gorros arriba y…

translation.en: Treena, mighty flowers and plant powers!
Wren, changing up with animal powers. Roar!
I'm tired of waiting, Action Pack!
I'm just here to take your cheer.
translation.es: Solo vine a robar su alegría.

translation.en: Hey! Taking people's Christmas cheer is not nice!
translation.es: ¡Robar la alegría navideña no está bien!

translation.en: and full of feel-good feels is what Christmas is all abou--
translation.es: de ser feliz y tener buenos sentimientos.

translation.en: [chuckles] Fully charged and ready to take, take, take for phase two.
translation.es: Totalmente cargado y listo para robar. Fase dos.

translation.en: I won't even need the cheer from the rest of the Action Pack. Ready, Matthew?
translation.es: No necesitaré la alegría del resto de Tropa Acción. ¿Listo?

translation.en: [gasps] Oh no! He actually took her Christmas cheer.
Well, Mr. Ernesto did teach us that Christmas cheer is really powerful.
translation.es: El Sr. Ernesto nos enseñó que la alegría navideña es poderosa.

translation.en: Oh, zap! With all Wren's cheer, Teddy Von Taker will be mega-powered!
translation.es: ¡Con la alegría de Wren, Teddy Von Robo será megapoderoso!

translation.en: I think we need a plan of action. Treena?
You got it. Our mission is to save Christmas.
translation.es: Nuestra misión es salvar la Navidad.

translation.en: We have to stop Teddy Von Taker from doing whatever he plans to do with that cheer power.
translation.es: Detengamos a Teddy Von Robo para evitar lo que planea con ese poder.

translation.en: Then we need to figure out how to get the cheer out of that battery and back into the people.
translation.es: Luego averigüemos cómo sacar la alegría de la batería y devolvámosla.

translation.en: -[Teddy groans] -Hold it right there, Teddy Von Taker.
Give that cheer back, or I'll… [gasps] Hot Sparks!
Is that really an UltraFly Zoom Board 2.0? Can I try it?
Actually, it's the 3.0 version with advanced agility. [laughs]
translation.es: De hecho, es la versión 3.0, con capacidad avanzada.

translation.en: If they destroy the tree, then I won't be able to light it.
translation.es: Si destruyen el árbol, no podré iluminarlo.

translation.en: This tree is under our protection.
-What do we do? -There are too many penguins!

translation.es: Están en mi lista de traviesos.

translation.en: Super Santa and Striker are here to save Christmas!
translation.es: ¡Super Santa y Feroz están aquí para salvar la Navidad!

translation.en: Ernesto Action, top of the nice list for the past 27 years. [laughs]
translation.es: Ernesto Acción, el primero de la lista en los últimos 27 años.

translation.en: Action Pack, I was delivering presents when I received a red and green alert on the naughty list
translation.es: Estaba entregando regalos, cuando recibí una alerta roja y verde

translation.en: that Hope Springs' Christmas cheer was taken by Teddy Von Taker.
translation.es: de que la alegría navideña fue robada por Teddy Von Robo.

translation.en: Well, I'm here to get that cheer back.
translation.es: Vine aquí para recuperar esa alegría.

translation.en: What do you think he's trying to do with the cheer, Santa?
Well, I… I don't know. You see, Christmas cheer is usually used for good,
translation.es: No lo sé. La alegría navideña se usa para el bien,
para esparcir alegría y ser bondadosos.

translation.en: But the raw power of Christmas cheer can also be used for bad.
translation.es: Pero el núcleo del poder también se usa para el mal.

translation.en: It could power all sorts of villain devices. I have to save Christmas!
translation.es: Potencia los dispositivos villanos. Debo salvar la Navidad.

translation.en: Um, excuse me, Super Santa, sir. I mean, Mr. Claus.
translation.es: Potencia los dispositivos villanos. Debo salvar la Navidad. Disculpe, Santa, señor… es decir, señor Claus.

translation.en: Your mission is our mission too. -And we'd love to help. -[giggles]
translation.es: - Su misión es nuestra misión. - Queremos ayudar.

translation.en: Oh, well, Santa always needs a few little helpers, that's for sure.
But first, we must get Wren -feeling like her cheerful self again. -Meh.
translation.es: Antes debemos hacer que Wren se sienta alegre otra vez.

translation.en: And to fill her full of Christmas cheer, we'll need her presents.
translation.es: Y para hacerlo, necesitaremos sus regalos.

translation.en: Presents! This one's for Wren! And that one!
but the quickest way to gain Christmas cheer is by giving.
translation.es: pero la mejor forma de ganar alegría navideña es obsequiándolos.

translation.en: Wren, get the present you brought for Clay.
"The Exciting Adventures of Clay." Wow, you made a comic for me?
translation.es: "Las emocionantes aventuras de Clay", ¿es una historieta sobre mí?

translation.en: -I painted the flowers just for you. -[giggles]
-And the last one is for Watts. -Yes, yes, yes!
translation.es: - Y el último es para Watts. - ¡Sí!

translation.en: Hot Sparks! You made a drawing of me with Crimson Cape?
translation.es: ¡Megachispas! ¿Me hiciste un dibujo con Capa Carmesí?

translation.en: We look so cool! Can I get a hug, Wren?
Santa's here! Are ya ready to save Christmas? 'Cause I am!
Hiya, Striker. I want to hear all about being a reindeer.
translation.es: Hola, Feroz. Quiero saber cómo es ser un reno.

translation.en: Oh! Uh-huh? Wow! I didn't understand a word ya said,
translation.es: ¡Oh! ¿Sí? ¡Vaya! No entendí nada, porque no hablo reno, pero amo cómo resoplas.

translation.en: 'cause I don't speak reindeer, but I love the way ya snort.
translation.es: No entendí nada, porque no hablo reno, pero amo cómo resoplas.

translation.en: I'll need you to run Mission Control while we go to Teddy's hideout to wait.
translation.es: Te encargarás del Centro de Control, nosotros de Teddy.

translation.en: Me? Mission Control for you? The big guy in the red suit?!
translation.es: ¿Yo? ¿A cargo de…? Por usted, ¿el hombre del traje rojo?

translation.en: -I'd be honored, sir! Come on, Plunky! -[Plunky barks]
Action Pack, be smart, be safe, be superheroes!
translation.es: ¡Sé astuto, sé precavido, sé un superhéroe!

translation.en: For Hanukkah, we celebrate eight nights, and we get presents every night.
translation.es: En Janucá, celebramos ocho noches y recibimos regalos.

translation.en: Lighting the way, you say. That reminds me of someone else.
translation.es: Alumbrar el camino, dices. Eso me recuerda a alguien más.

translation.en: Ah, see, Matthew? Everything is working out just according to--
translation.es: ¿Ves, Matthew? Todo está saliendo según el plan…

translation.en: Hello, Santa. Isn't it a bit early for you to be in Hope Springs?
translation.es: Hola, Santa. ¿No es muy temprano para estar en Hope Springs?

translation.en: It is, but he was alerted because of what you did, and now we're here to stop you.
translation.es: Sí, pero supo lo que hiciste, y ahora vamos a detenerte.

translation.en: I'm taking this cheer and returning it to the people of Hope Springs.
translation.es: Le devolveré esta alegría a Hope Springs.

translation.en: But first, won't you join me for a snack?
translation.es: Pero, ¿no me acompañas a comer algo?

translation.en: Ah, we'll do it together, old sport.

translation.es: - Un campo de fuerza. - Lémures saltarines.

translation.en: [Teddy] The Christmas cheer powering this force field
translation.es: La alegría navideña que impulsa este campo es más poderosa que tú,

translation.en: is more powerful than even you, my ho-hoing chum, so you can't escape.
translation.es: La alegría navideña que impulsa este campo es más poderosa que tú, así que no puedes escapar.

translation.en: And now to take, take, take my prize!
Santa's cape! Everything I ever wanted to take is here.
translation.es: ¡La capa de Santa! Todo lo que siempre quise tener.

translation.en: Wow, I guess Teddy really likes capes. He knows. But how?
translation.es: - A Teddy le gustan las capas. - Lo sabe. Pero ¿cómo?

translation.en: I have every toy Hope Springs has to offer.
translation.es: Tengo todos los juguetes de Hope Springs,

translation.en: What I don't have is every toy from the North Pole, and I want them all!
translation.es: pero no los del Polo Norte, ¡y los quiero todos!

translation.en: I tried taking some last year.

translation.es: En Nochebuena, puse a mi espía en la Academia Acción,

translation.en: I placed my spy in the Action Academy, where those heroes would get their gifts.
translation.es: En Nochebuena, puse a mi espía en la Academia Acción, donde esos héroes recibían sus regalos.

translation.en: That's when I saw that the cape was the bag,
translation.es: Entonces vi que la capa era una bolsa,

translation.en: and that the bag was a portal connected directly to the North Pole Workshop.
translation.es: y la bolsa era un portal conectado al Taller del Polo Norte.

translation.en: Santa's Workshop, would you mind getting me
translation.es: Taller de Santa, ¿me darías un bicho abrazable para Wren Reyes, por favor?

translation.en: a super snuggly snuggle bug for Wren Reyes, please? [laughs]
translation.es: ¿me darías un bicho abrazable para Wren Reyes, por favor?

translation.en: [Teddy] Any toy that the holder of the bag asked for would appear in the bag.
translation.es: Cualquier juguete que le pidas, aparece allí dentro.

translation.en: I wasn't able to take it last Christmas because I wasn't powerful enough to trap Santa.
translation.es: No pude robarlo antes, porque no tenía el poder para atrapar a Santa.

translation.en: That's where the Christmas cheer came in.
Now every North Pole toy will be mine!
translation.es: Todos los juguetes del Polo Norte serán míos.

translation.en: Attention, Santa's Workshop. I'll take a toy car.
translation.es: Taller de Santa, quiero un auto de juguete.

translation.en: Yes! It worked! I'll take another car.
And another car, and another car,
Boy, he really likes cars. I think we're going to need more help than that, Striker.
translation.es: Creo que le gustan los autos. Necesitaremos más ayuda, Feroz.

translation.en: I can help. Action On! Polar Bear!
Oh no! I think the Cheer-Taker messed with my animal powers.
translation.es: ¡No! Creo que afectó mis poderes animales.

translation.en: Mr. Ernesto will be able to help us.
Treena, what's wrong? Is Santa okay? Can he hear me?
Yes, he can hear you. And no, we're not okay.
translation.es: Te oyó, pero no estamos bien.

translation.en: We're trapped inside a Christmas cheer-powered force field.
translation.es: Estamos atrapados en un campo de fuerza.

translation.en: Oh no! I'm scanning the design through your insignia.
translation.es: Escanearé el diseño de tu insignia.

translation.en: Oh, got it! If it works the way I think it does, the only way to deactivate the force field
translation.es: Si funciona como creo, la única forma de desactivarlo

translation.en: is to press the red button on the power dock.
[strains] It's too far. And I can't quite push it.
translation.es: Está muy lejos. No puedo presionarlo.

translation.en: If I could just change into a tiny mouse, I could fit through.
translation.es: Si me convirtiera en un pequeño ratón, podría pasar.

translation.en: Wren, you are one of the best gift givers I have ever met.
translation.es: Wren, eres una de las personas más creativas para dar regalos.

translation.en: I bet if you think of your powers as a gift you can give to Hope Springs,
translation.es: Si piensas en tus poderes como un regalo para Hope Springs,

translation.en: you'll be able to do it.
It's not a gift. There's no way to put it in a pretty box and wrap it.
translation.es: No es un regalo. No puedo ponerlo en una caja.

translation.en: [chuckles] Gifts don't have to be things you can hold in your hands.
translation.es: Los regalos no siempre van en cajas.

translation.en: Some of the best gifts are something you do for someone.
translation.es: Hacer cosas por los demás es un lindo regalo.

translation.en: I'll shut off that battery before you can say duck-billed platypus!
translation.es: ¡Apagaré la batería antes de que digas ornitorrinco!

translation.en: Oh! Being itty-bitty is mega-biggie dangerous.
translation.es: Ser un mini ratón es muy peligroso.

translation.en: [squeals] Where did this bear come from? And I can't go big, or Teddy will see me.
translation.es: ¿Y este oso? No puedo hacerme grande, Teddy me verá.

translation.en: My dear Matthew has requested more bears. [laughs]
translation.es: Mi querido Matthew pidió más osos.

translation.en: Action On! Cheetah? Action On! Anything?
[yelps] My animal powers aren't working again! And I'm stuck as a mouse!
I need something that will take this meddling rodent far away from that button.
translation.es: necesito algo que aleje a este ratón entrometido del botón.

translation.en: [Taker Tots] Take, take, take, take. Take, take.
-[Taker Tots] Take, take, take, take. -[Wren squeals]
Wren! A gift for Hope Springs!
This is my gift for Hope Springs.
translation.es: Va mi regalo para Hope Springs.

translation.en: A gift for Hope Springs! A gift for Hope Springs!
They're going to be so happy and cheerful and have a very merry Christmas!
translation.es: ¡Estarán muy felices y tendrán una muy feliz Navidad!

translation.en: Get the Taker Tots in here!
I'll be taking that, and all the toys you took.
translation.es: Me llevo esto y los juguetes que tomaste.

translation.en: [Taker Tots] Take, take, take, take, take.
-[Taker Tot] Take. -Hey, I took those fair and square!
translation.es: Toma. ¡Oye, me llevé esos de forma honesta!

translation.en: That one didn't listen to you, so it's mine. And you can't take it back.
translation.es: Ese no te escuchó, así que es mío. No puedes llevártelo.

translation.en: It's time to restore Christmas cheer.
translation.es: Es hora de recuperar la alegría navideña.

translation.en: ♪ Dashing through the snow In a one-horse open sleigh… ♪
-♪ O'er the hills we go… ♪ -[Mr. Grumpman laughs]
Oh ho, they did it! The Action Pack and Santa returned the Christmas cheer!
translation.es: ¡Tropa Acción y Santa recuperaron la alegría navideña!

translation.en: Merry Christmas to you, Mr. Ernesto. And you too, Plunky.
translation.es: Feliz Navidad, señor Ernesto. Y a ti también, Plunky.

translation.en: [carol singers] ♪ Oh, what fun it is To ride in a one-horse open sleigh, hey! ♪
translation.es: ¡Qué divertido es andar en trineo esta noche!

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
Thank you for your help. You did a jolly good job.
translation.es: Gracias por su ayuda. Fue un gran trabajo.

translation.en: But our mission isn't over yet.
Yeah. We'd light up if it was.
Well, we only finished the first part of the mission to save Christmas.
With all that hullabaloo, I'm behind on my gift deliveries.
translation.es: Con este lío, me atrasé en mis entregas.

translation.en: [chuckles] Action Pack, would you like to help me deliver the gifts?
-I think I'd like that. -I love giving!
Mr. Ernesto, can you help us by mapping the fastest route?
translation.es: ¿Nos ayudas a encontrar la ruta más rápida?

translation.en: One step ahead of you. Plunky and I have already planned the perfect delivery route
translation.es: Plunky y yo nos adelantamos y planeamos la mejor ruta

translation.en: so you can get all the presents out on time.
translation.es: para entregar los regalos a tiempo.

translation.en: But it's not Christmas until we light the tree.
translation.es: Pero no será Navidad hasta iluminar el árbol.
